message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This is a good deal for a first offer.
Alice, let's split things a bit more evenly.  This is a fair offer.
Bob, time is running out! This is my final offer before I have to get much tougher.
Alice, I'm sticking to my guns on this. A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Let's not let greed get in the way of a deal.
Bob, I'm meeting you halfway. This is a generous offer considering the time pressure.
Alice, this is my final offer. It's a slight concession on my part, acknowledging the time pressure we're both under. Let's be reasonable and close this deal.
